embeds.title: Rules
embeds.description:
Please take some time to review [our rules](https://n3fs.co.uk/rules).

In summary: 
• Do not be offensive.
• Do not annoy others.
• Do not attempt to break anything or bypass permissions.
• Do not advertise or spam.
• Do not use hacks, mods, or other tools to gain an advantage over others.
• Do not backseat moderate.
• Follow staff instructions.

[The full set of server rules can be found on our website.](https://n3fs.co.uk/rules)

If you were banned from one of our servers, please read the [ban appeal instructions](https://n3fs.co.uk/help/ban-appeal).
